text: Jason Eli Becker (born July 22, 1969) is an American musician, songwriter and composer. He is known for his albums Speed Metal Symphony in 1987, Go Off! in 1988, Perpetual Burn in 1988 and A Little Ain't Enough. In the 1990s, Becker was diagnosed with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis. ==References== ==Other websites== * Jason Becker's official website * Becker's MySpace page * Shrapnel Records official website * Documentary film website Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American rock guitarists Category:American composers Category:American songwriters Category:Musicians from California Category:Writers from California Category:People from Richmond, California
title: Jason Becker
